Articles.Content: During a refueling mission for a single-launch station, I switched between 2 of my spacecraft using the [] keys, and every single joint exploded on the station exploded in the process.
Thats a bug that was present in .19. As far as I know, it happens at random.
It's not random with mine, i've now had it happen 3 times with 2 different launch setups
Happened to my Gilly Explorer rover in 0.19

no. This is on 2 different computers now, 3 different target vehicles. Go to switch at about 500 meters, and suddenly, BOOM, every joint explodes, leaving a massive debris field, and sometimes destroying the cockpit. Everything is stock, no FAR, no b7, no anything, completely vanilla, running now on a windows 7 and windows 8 pc
strange. I have switched vessels several times, how many parts total do they have?
Maybe it's a new random computer targeting kracken.
maybe. It certainly makes docking a pain in the
